prod.full_name: Nike Dunk Low Retro Black Hyper Cobalt (2021)
prod.path: Home/Sneakers/Nike/Dunk/Nike Dunk Low Retro Hyper Cobalt (2021)
prod.desciption:
The Nike Dunk Low Retro Black Hyper Cobalt brings familiar color blocking to the basketball silhouette, sharing a flipped design of the classic Air Jordan 1 Royal.

The Nike Dunk Low Retro Black Hyper Cobalt (2021) features a mix of Black and Hyper Cobalt leather overlays throughout the upper. Traditional �NIKE� branding is embroidered in black on the heel. A Black and Hyper Cobalt Nike logo tongue tag is stitched atop a nylon tongue. To finish off the design is a Hyper Cobalt outsole.

The Nike Dunk Low Retro Black Hyper Cobalt (2021) released in February of 2021 for $100.
